data.title: Julius Nyerere and The Catholic Church
data.meta_description: Julius Nyerere and the Catholic church - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses the potential canonization of Julius Nyerere, the first president of Tanzania, as a Catholic saint. It provides background on Nyerere's life and leadership, both within Tanzania and internationally. Nyerere has already been given the title of "Servant of God" by the Catholic Church in Tanzania, which is the first step towards sainthood. The Church sees Nyerere as a model of heroic virtue due to both his public life and work, as well as the ethical principles that motivated his actions. Nyerere made major contributions to Tanzanian independence and unity, as well as to liberation movements across Africa and the end of apartheid in South Africa.
